description:
Have you ever wanted to create a presentation, but never really had the time or the know how? If so, this course is designed for you.

With three hours of course content, The Beginner's Guide to Keynote for Mac is sure to take your presentations to the next level.

We'll start out downloading and installing Keynote from the Mac App Store, and move on to basic navigation, use of the media bar and the inspector, and even look at Apple's pre-built templates and themes.

Finally, we'll focus on educational and professional use of Keynote to make the most of this software in many scenarios.

There are a couple short quizzes along the way to help the retention of information, and upon completion, you will receive a certificate from Udemy.

If you have a Mac and a bit of creativity, I assure you that this course will drastically improve your visual presentations.
title: The Beginner's Guide to Keynote for Mac
